name: Royel Enfield
des1: A fully responsive modern website where user can order cars and orders will be stored in database
des2: Users can login with google authentication and email password authentication
des3: Users has to be logged in to order and view details
des5: Admin can confirm or cancel order from the admin dashboard
technologies: ReactJS, React Routing, MongoDB atlas, netlify, heroku, firebase authentication, materialUI, swiperjs, REST API, nodejs, expressjs

name: Tour Plan
des1: A fully responsive modern website where user can get appointment and appointment will be stored in database
des2: Users can login with google authentication and email password authentication
des3: Users has to be logged in to get appointment and view appointments
des4: Users can get appointment on their desired date
des5: Admin can confirm or cancel appointment from the admin dashboard
technologies: ReactJS, React Routing, MongoDB atlas, netlify, heroku, firebase authentication, materialUI, REST API, nodejs, expressjs

name: Medicare
des1: A fully responsive modern website where user can order rides and orderes will be stored in database
des2: Users can login with google authentication and email password authentication
des3: Users has to be logged in to get appointment and view appointments
des5: Users can request a order and order will be added in the home page
technologies: ReactJS, React Routing, MongoDB atlas, heroku, firebase hosting, firebase authentication, React Bootstrap, REST API, nodejs, expressjs
